affiliateApplication.joinProgramDescription: Earn commissions by promoting our products. Click the button below to join the affiliate program.

affiliateStatus.applicationInProgress: Your affiliate application is under review.
affiliateStatus.applicationApproved: Your affiliate account has been approved.
affiliateStatus.applicationRejected: Your affiliate application has been rejected. Contact our support team for more information.

affiliateStatus.accountCancelConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to cancel your affiliate account?
affiliateStatus.accountCancelConfirmMessage: This action CANNOT BE UNDONE! All your earnings, links, and data will be permanently deleted. You will need to reapply to become an affiliate again.
affiliateStatus.accountCancelSuccess: Your affiliate account has been successfully cancelled!
affiliateStatus.accountCancelError: An error occurred while cancelling the account!
affiliateStatus.applicationNote: You cannot submit a new application until your current application is reviewed.

affiliatePayment.amountExceedsTransferable: The requested amount cannot exceed the transferable amount.
